trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> permite que você execute funções como acerto de teste, corte e apagar os traços.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> provides, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> offers more options.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> controle executa muitas dessas funções, mas se você precisa de mais controle que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> fornece, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> oferece mais opções.

trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade personalizada.

trans-unit.source: <c>propertyData</c> must be of type <see cref="T:System.Char" />, <see cref="T:System.Byte" />, <see cref="T:System.Int16" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />, <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt32" />, <see cref="T:System.Int64" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt64" />, <see cref="T:System.Single" />, <see cref="T:System.Double" />, <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />, <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />, <see cref="T:System.String" />, <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> or an array of these data types, except <see cref="T:System.String" />, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: <c>propertyData</c> deve ser do tipo <see cref="T:System.Char" />, <see cref="T:System.Byte" />, <see cref="T:System.Int16" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />, <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt32" />, <see cref="T:System.Int64" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt64" />, <see cref="T:System.Single" />, <see cref="T:System.Double" />, <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />, <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />, <see cref="T:System.String" />, <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> ou uma matriz desses tipos de dados, exceto <see cref="T:System.String" />, que não é permitido.

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma propriedade personalizada ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> method enables you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> método permite adicionar propriedades personalizadas para um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, você pode incluir informações adicionais com um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and get custom property data.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar e obter dados de propriedade personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The `AddTimeStamp_Click` method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> method to add the current time to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O `AddTimeStamp_Click` método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> método para adicionar a hora atual para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The `GetTimeStap_Click` method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetPropertyData%2A> method to retrieve the timestamp from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O `GetTimeStap_Click` método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetPropertyData%2A> método para recuperar o carimbo de hora da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> is an empty <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> é um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyData" /> is not one of the allowed data types listed in the <see langword="Parameters" /> section.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyData" /> não é um dos tipos de dados permitidos listados na seção <see langword="Parameters" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears all strokes from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Limpa todos os traços do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes all strokes in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> that are outside the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os traços no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> que estão fora dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que especifica a área a ser recortada.

trans-unit.source: Removes all strokes in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> that are outside the bounds of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> array.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os traços no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> que estão fora dos limites da matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Clip%2A> method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Clip%2A> método conecta os primeiro e último pontos no `lassoPoints` para criar o laço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Clip%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it clips.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Clip%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> recorta por ele.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to clip the strokes in a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como recortar os traços em um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> called `presenter`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> chamado `presenter`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que especifica a área a ser recortada.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not extend beyond the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Substitui todos os traços que estão recortados pelo retângulo especificado por novos traços que não saem dos limites do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely outside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: Todos os traços que estão totalmente fora do retângulo especificado são removidos.

trans-unit.target: Copia o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Clone%2A> method copies each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in the collection and the new <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> references the new strokes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Clone%2A> método copia cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> na coleção e o novo <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> faz referência os novos traçados.

trans-unit.target: Há dois <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> objetos chamados `inkCanvas1` e `inkCanvas2.`

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event has been connected to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> evento foi conectado ao manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> a ser localizado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the specified custom property identifier is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se o identificador de propriedade personalizada especificada está no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified custom property identifier is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o identificador da propriedade personalizada especificada estiver no objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to check for custom property in a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como verificar a propriedade personalizada em um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: If a custom property has been associated with `timestamp`, the example gets that custom property and shows when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> was saved.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade personalizada foi associada `timestamp`, o exemplo obtém a propriedade personalizada e mostra quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> foi salvo.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> na qual desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Draws the strokes in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Desenha os traços no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a custom element that displays a thumbnail view of an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um elemento personalizado que exibe uma exibição em miniatura de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: The custom element keeps a reference to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> and redraws itself when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeCollected> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O elemento personalizado mantém uma referência a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> e redesenha a mesma quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeCollected> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Removes the ink that is within the bounds of the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Remove a tinta que está dentro dos limites da área especificada.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que especifica a área a ser apagada.

trans-unit.source: Removes the ink that is within the bounds of the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Remove a tinta que está dentro dos limites da área especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> método conecta os primeiro e último pontos no `lassoPoints` para criar o laço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> podem conter traços novo após o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a área especificada estiver no meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, o método apagar remove que <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> e cria dois novos traçados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> apaga por ele.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to erase strokes in a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como apagar traços em um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> called `presenter`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> chamado `presenter`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que especifica a área a ser apagada.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not enter the bounds of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Substitui todos os traços que estão recortados pelo retângulo especificado por novos traçados que não adentram os limites do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> podem conter traços novo após o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a área especificada estiver no meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, o método apagar remove que <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> e cria dois novos traçados.

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely inside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: Todos os traços que estão completamente dentro do retângulo especificado são removidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> apaga por ele.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to erase the ink within the <xref:System.Windows.Rect>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como apagar tinta dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Rect>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> called `presenter`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> chamado `presenter`.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that specifies the path to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> que especifica o caminho a ser apagado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> that specifies the shape of the eraser.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> que especifica a forma da borracha.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the region created by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> along the specified path with new Strokes that are not clipped by the region.
trans-unit.target: Substitui todos os traços que estão recortados pela região criada pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> especificado junto do caminho especificado com novos Traços que não são recortados por região.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> podem conter traços novo após o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if `path` intersects the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `path` intercepta o meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, o método apagar remove que <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> e cria dois novos traçados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Erase%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> apaga por ele.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to erase ink along a specific path.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como apagar tinta ao longo de um caminho específico.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> called `presenter`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> chamado `presenter`.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the strokes in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites dos traços na coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that contains the bounds of the strokes in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que contém os limites dos traços no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetBounds%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> that takes the appearance of the rendered <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetBounds%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Rect> que tem a aparência de renderizado <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is 10 display independent pixels (DIP) wide, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect> includes the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> é 10 exibição pixels independentes (DIP) grande, o <xref:System.Windows.Rect> inclui toda a largura do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> and draw them on the control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como obter os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> e desenhe-los no controle.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.source: The minimum percentage of each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> that must be contained within the lasso for it to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: O percentual mínimo de cada <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> que deve estar contido no laço para ser considerado uma ocorrência.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester" /> that hit tests the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> with a lasso (freehand) path.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester" /> que testa os cliques do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> com um caminho de laço (à mão livre).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester" /> that hit tests the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester" /> que testa os clique de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalLassoHitTester%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalLassoHitTester%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> que considera um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> seja "atingido" quando o caminho de Laço ao seu redor.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to select a stroke with a lasso tool.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para implementar recursos, como a capacidade de selecionar um traço com a ferramenta de Laço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> to implement the lasso selection tool.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> usa um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> para implementar a ferramenta de seleção de Laço.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> that enables a user to select strokes with a lasso tool.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como obter um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> que permite que um usuário selecione traços com a ferramenta de Laço.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to select ink, see [How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário selecione tinta, consulte [como: selecionar tinta de um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> that specifies the tip of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> que especifica a ponta da caneta.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" /> that hit tests the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> with an erasing path.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" /> que testa os cliques do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> com um caminho de apagamento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" /> that hit tests the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" /> que testa os clique de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester%2A> método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> que considera um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> seja "atingido" quando o caminho de borracha faz interseção com ele.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to erase part of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para implementar recursos, como a capacidade de apagar parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> usa um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> that can be used to erase part of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como obter um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> que pode ser usado para apagar parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the custom property to get.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associado à propriedade personalizada a ser obtida.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor da propriedade personalizada associada ao <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade personalizada associada ao <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetPropertyData%2A> methods enable you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetPropertyData%2A> métodos permitem adicionar propriedades personalizadas para um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, você pode incluir informações adicionais com um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and get custom property data.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar e obter dados de propriedade personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The `AddTimeStamp_Click` method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> method to add the current time to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O `AddTimeStamp_Click` método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> método para adicionar a hora atual para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The `GetTimeStap_Click` method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetPropertyData%2A> method to retrieve the timestamp from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O `GetTimeStap_Click` método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.GetPropertyData%2A> método para recuperar o carimbo de hora da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.target: Representa o formato de persistência nativo para dados de tinta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.InkSerializedFormat> field to specify the format of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> when you transfer data, such as when you copy the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.InkSerializedFormat> campo para especificar o formato da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> ao transferir dados, como quando você copia o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> na área de transferência.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como copiar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> na área de transferência.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> é no Ink serializado Format (ISF), para que outros programas, como o Microsoft Office Word pode aceitar os dados copiados.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando qualquer propriedade <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.OnStrokesChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.OnStrokesChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um delegado, que é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.OnStrokesChanged(System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.OnStrokesChanged(System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.OnStrokesChanged(System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.OnStrokesChanged(System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs)" /> método para a classe base para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when custom property is added or removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade personalizada é adicionada ou removida do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Guid> called `dateTimeGuid` and the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged> event is connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Guid> chamado `dateTimeGuid` e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged> evento está conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified strokes from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove os traços especificados da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Remove%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it removes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Remove%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> remove.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to remove all strokes that are at least 80 percent within the specified lasso from a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como remover todos os traços que são pelo menos 80 por cento dentro do Laço especificado de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when a custom control enables the user to select ink with a lasso.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando um controle personalizado permite que o usuário selecione ink com um laço.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to select ink with a lasso, see [How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário selecione ink com um laço, consulte [como: selecionar tinta de um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The specified index.
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the stroke at the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o traço no índice especificado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the custom property to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associado à propriedade personalizada a ser removida.

trans-unit.source: Removes the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove a propriedade personalizada associada ao <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to remove a custom property from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como remover uma propriedade personalizada a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1` and a <xref:System.Guid> called `timestamp`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1` e um <xref:System.Guid> chamado `timestamp`.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the strokes in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Substitui os traços na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> to replace.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> a ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: The source <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> especificado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> indicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Replace%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Replace%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to replace the selected strokes on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> with another <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir os traços selecionados em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> com outro <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="strokesToReplace" /> está vazio.

trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> em <paramref name="strokesToReplaceWith" /> já está em <paramref name="strokesToReplace" />.

trans-unit.source: The destination <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> de destino.

trans-unit.target: A fonte de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.target: Substitui o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> especificado por um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Replace%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it replaces.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Replace%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> evento para cada <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> ele substitui.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to replace the selected strokes on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> with another <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir os traços selecionados em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> com outro <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="strokesToReplace" /> está vazio.

trans-unit.source: Saves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Salva o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to which to save the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> no qual salvar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Saves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Salva o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> no <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Save%2A> method saves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> as Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Save%2A> método salva o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> em tinta serializado Format (ISF).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to save a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> to a file by using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como salvar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> para um arquivo usando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29> método.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to which to save the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> no qual salvar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to compress the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para compactar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Saves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and compresses it, when specified.
trans-unit.target: Salva o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> no <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> especificado e o compacta, quando indicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Save%2A> method saves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> as Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Save%2A> método salva o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> em tinta serializado Format (ISF).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to save a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> to a file by using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como salvar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> para um arquivo usando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Boolean%29> método.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to replace the stroke.
trans-unit.target: A posição na qual o traçado será substituído.

trans-unit.source: The stroke to replace the current stroke.
trans-unit.target: O traço para substituir o traço atual.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the stroke at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o traço no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> in the collection changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> nesta coleção é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds the current time as a custom property to each new stroke in the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir adiciona a hora atual como uma propriedade personalizada para cada novo traço no <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event is connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> evento está conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> which specifies the transformation to perform on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> que especifica a transformação a ser executada no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para aplicar a transformação à ponta da caneta; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Modifies each of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints" /> and optionally the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform" /> for each stroke in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> according to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: Modifica cada um dos <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints" /> e, opcionalmente, o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform" /> para cada traço no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> conforme o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Transform%2A> method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes.
trans-unit.target: Quando `applyToStylusTip` é `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.Transform%2A> método afeta a forma da dica de caneta, bem como a posição dos traços.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você gira um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> 90 graus, mover os traços em torno de um eixo e a altura e largura dos traços parecem ser invertida.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to move all the strokes on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como mover todos eles um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.
